profile:
Our Final Finish teams provide professional, high-quality drywall and paint finishes for any sized projects. Our area of expertise is:
-Framing
-Insulation
-Drywall Installation
-Drywall taping 
-Stucco Removal
-Painting
- Vinyl and laminate flooring 

We often handle full scale projects, doing basement and full home renovations contracting other reliable, skilled tradesmen to finish any other tasks outside of our area of expertise.
warranty_terms: Limited warranty, please ask for details.
name: Final Finish Drywall and Painting Services

profile: Established in 2008, Jasperis Contracting specializes in interior finishing. Whether you are looking for commercial-retail, office spaces, residential or minor renovations, our team can provide reliable friendly services to ensure results. Communicating and educating our clients is a crucial component to all of our  jobs. Our dedication and knowledge will ensure all your needs are met and your budget is intact. Our trades are professionally trained assuring quality service from start to finish.
services:
•	Project management 
•	Framing metal and wood stud
•	Acoustic ceilings (T-Bar)
•	Insulation (fire and sound)
•	Drywall and taping
•	Trim and doors
•	Wood flooring
•	Fire rating 
•	Patch and repair (no job is too small)
•	24 hour emergency service

profile: AVL Landscape and design is a family orientated company with over 15 years of experience within the industry. Our number one priority is pleasing our clients and fulfilling their expectations. Our vast knowledge of top-rated products and design allows our staff to cater uniquely to each project. We specialize in custom landscaping, offering personalized cedar decks, interlocking, concrete, water features (such as ponds, waterfalls), outdoor lighting effects, fireplaces and outdoor kitchens. We take great pride in our work and maintain a high standard of excellence in everything we do. We look forward to working on your next outdoor project and promise nothing less than the best.
name: Avl Landscape & Design

profile: Handiman 4U is a one-stop resource for all your home maintenance needs. We specialize in home repairs and renovations. With more than 30 years in the home building trades, founder Claude Mainville has a simple philosophy: there is no job too small for Handiman 4U! Small, inexpensive repair and maintenance jobs often turn into costly major repairs if left unattended. We invite you to explore our site, learn about our exciting preventive maintenance programs and supplier discounts we have available for all your home renovation needs.

profile:
Sandman Painting & Problem-Solving is an insured, professional, full service company specializing in residential painting, dustless popcorn ceiling removal and repair, dustless drywall sanding, drywall installations and repairs, plastering, taping, mudding and repairs, hardwood and vinyl floor installations, baseboard and trim installations and minor home renovations and repairs.
We bring over 30 years experience from the residential, commercial and industrial sectors.
Sandman provides all clients with the highest level of professionalism throughout all offered services  including painting,  flooring installations and other home renovation projects.
Sandman provides exclusive service to the residential sector. 
Sandman Painting & Problem-Solving was built on a foundation of quality workmanship, trust and dedication so you don’t have to worry about getting value for your dollar, you get even more!
For all your painting, flooring installations and home renovation projects, be confident knowing Sandman Painting & Problem-Solving will work with you until your specific needs are met. 
The Only Thing Better Than Our Handshake Is Our Work.
